title: Interesting Yas changes on the PBE

embed.description: ( With the release of patch 7.10 to live on May 17th, we started the new 7.11 PBE cycle. ) Previous PBE Cycles in 2017 Below you will find a comprehensive list of new content, balance changes, and whatever else is included in the current PBE cycle!

body:
>Yasuo
>Steel Tempest (Q) duration for stacks of steel tempest  lowered from 10 to 6 seconds.
>
>Sweeping Blade (E) cooldown changed from 0.5/0.4/0.3/0.2/0.1 to 1/0.75/0.5/0.25/0.

So what do you all think of these changes?  I know the Q nerf was asked quite a bit on the boards.

replies.body: They are literally listening to the boards to nerf champions instead of logic. DO you know what a 4 second nerf does to Yasuo. fuckign riot.

Ya I know what it makes, it makes it so you cannot zone a tank or mage opponent out of the minion wave by simply holding of your stacks until they are about to expire, plus having a shield and w to deter poke and then mindlessly push with e to get first tower
Why in gods name are they buffing his E?
